name: Sega Smash Pack: Volume 1
overview: Sega Smash Pack Volume 1 was released for the Dreamcast in 2001 in North America only. It featured twelve games: - Altered Beast - Columns - Golden Axe - Phantasy Star II - The Revenge of Shinobi - Sega Swirl - Shining Force - Sonic the Hedgehog - Streets of Rage 2 - Vectorman - Virtua Cop 2 - Wrestle War
